#include <iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;//\\...INSM02
int main() 
{int tc;
cin>>tc;
while(tc--)
{
	int n,m,k;
	cin>>k>>n>>m;
	int arr[101][101],dp[101][101];
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		for(int j=0;j<m;j++)
		{	cin>>arr[i][j];
			dp[i][j]=arr[i][j];
		}
	for(int j=0;j<m;j++)
		dp[0][j]=arr[0][j];
	for(int i=1;i<n;i++)
	{	for(int j=0;j<m;j++)
		{
			if(j==0)
				dp[i][j] += min(dp[i-1][j],dp[i-1][j+1]);
			else if(j==m-1)
				dp[i][j] += min(dp[i-1][j],dp[i-1][j-1]);
			else
				dp[i][j] += min(min(dp[i-1][j-1],dp[i-1][j]),dp[i-1][j+1]);
		}
	}
	int minn = 100000;
	for(int j=0;j<m;j++)
	{
		if(dp[n-1][j] < minn)
			minn = dp[n-1][j];
	}
	if(minn < k)
		cout<<"YES\n";
	else
		cout<<"NO\n";
}
return 0;
}
